title: How to deal with performance issues - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming you’re not talking about ED (Erectile Dysfunction), but of a work-related issue, and also assuming that a worker’s performance is not up to expectations then a practical approach is required. First, facility that the required resources are provided for them to meet their expected performance, secondly, provide the resources of yourself or another employee to bring them up to speed and that they know what’s expected from them. thirdly, it’s time to consider a layoff or termination if performance is still an issue. The above is solely work-related (minus the attempted pun).

As in, does their work poorly, incorrectly, inaccurately or not on time? Speak with your Supervisor. Be prepared to provide specifics and documentation. Hopefully, the person will either improve their performance or you will get a different coworker.
